value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Where...are we? This looks just like
the temple we were just in, but...$k$pGullveig is gone...$k$pAnd $Nu is...
Where is $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We're free of that barrier that had
formed around us too. Is this... This
must be the world of the past now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Amazing work, Seiðr! How many days
back have we gone?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Judging by the state of this temple...
we may have gone a few...hundred
years in the past.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A few hundred YEARS?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Did $Nu not make
it out?$k$pWas $Nu...taken
by Gullveig?$k$pEveryone else made it here to the
past, right? Did—$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|No, I can still sense the presence
of the one to whom I gave my
revelation...somewhere nearby.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Gullveig may have interfered,
disrupting our attempt to flee.$k$pIt seems $Nu was
sent elsewhere.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We should begin a search. We cannot
afford to have anything happen to
$Nu out there...$k$pLet's split up and begin our search!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Normal,Face|Wherever I go, I am met by the
specter of war.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$Fi1500|$bEvBg_VanaCave|$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|...Are you awake now?$k$pYou were at the bottom of this ravine
and appear to have been seriously
injured... You must have fallen.$k$pOh... Try not to move. With those
wounds, it would be best for you
to remain still.$k$pPlease, stay and rest awhile.$k$pI am Kvasir, by the way. I live here
in this ravine.$k$p...What's your name?$k$pAh...$Nu...$k$pWhat an unusual name...
$Nu...$k$pWell, it is best for you to stay put
for now, $Nu.$k$p$Sbs150|
